data.lyric:
[ti:Ghostbusters]
[ar:Various]
[al:100 tubes 80s]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Ghostbusters(RAY PARKER JR.) - Ray Parker, Jr.
[00:27.31](Ghostbusters!)
[00:27.94]
[00:28.90]If there's somethin' strange in your neighborhood
[00:32.34]
[00:33.91]Who ya gonna call?
[00:34.64]
[00:35.55](Ghostbusters!)
[00:36.45]
[00:37.80]If it's somethin' weird an' it don't look good
[00:41.10]
[00:42.05]Who ya gonna call?
[00:43.57]
[00:44.18](Ghostbusters!)
[00:44.79]
[00:52.83]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[00:54.19]
[01:01.16]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[01:02.52]
[01:11.04]If you're seein' things runnin' through your head
[01:14.28]
[01:15.08]Who can you call?
[01:16.28]
[01:17.09](Ghostbusters!)
[01:17.98]
[01:19.37]An invisible man sleepin' in your bed
[01:22.75]
[01:23.38]Oh who ya gonna call?
[01:25.45](Ghostbusters!)
[01:27.19]
[01:34.18]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[01:35.72]
[01:40.56]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[01:43.95]
[01:48.88]Who ya gonna call?
[01:50.30](Ghostbusters!)
[01:51.13]
[01:52.69]If you're all alone, pick up the phone
[01:55.75]
[01:56.76]And call
[01:57.32]
[01:58.66](Ghostbusters!)
[01:59.45]
[02:03.39]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[02:04.58]
[02:07.65]I hear it likes the girls
[02:08.87]
[02:11.54]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[02:13.21]
[02:15.77]Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:17.30]
[02:22.14]Who you gonna call?
[02:23.73](Ghostbusters!)
[02:24.89]Mmm, if you've had a dose
[02:27.81]Of a freaky ghost baby
[02:29.89]
[02:30.41]You better call
[02:31.16]
[02:31.87](Ghostbusters!)
[02:32.63]
[02:47.33]Let me tell you somethin'
[02:48.33]
[02:49.07]Bustin' makes me feel good
[02:50.65]
[02:57.41]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[02:58.90]
[03:03.61]I ain't afraid o' no ghost
[03:07.10]
[03:09.86]Don't get caught alone, oh no
[03:11.93]
[03:13.39](Ghostbusters!)
[03:14.28]
[03:15.73]When he comes through your door
[03:17.68]Unless you just a want some more
[03:19.64]I think you better call
[03:21.05]
[03:21.68](Ghostbusters!)
[03:22.51]
[03:23.29]Oh, who you gonna call?
[03:25.33]
[03:26.13](Ghostbusters!)
[03:26.78]
[03:28.22]Who you gonna call?
[03:29.29]
[03:30.00](Ghostbusters!)
[03:30.74]
[03:31.73]Ah, think you better call
[03:33.49]
[03:34.21](Ghostbusters!)
[03:34.92]
[03:36.58]Who you gonna call?
[03:38.39](Ghostbusters!)
[03:39.30]I can't hear you
[03:40.91]Who you gonna call?
[03:41.78]
[03:42.53](Ghostbusters!)
[03:43.19]
[03:44.98]Louder
[03:45.74]
[03:46.69](Ghostbusters!)
[03:47.34]
[03:48.99]Who you gonna call?
[03:50.97](Ghostbusters!)
[03:51.98]
[03:53.22]Who can you call?
[03:54.22]
[03:55.18](Ghostbusters!)
